DataElement.preferredName: Extranodal Or Spleen Involvement Occurrence Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The indicator that describes whether or not there was extranodal or splenic involvement.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Situated outside of a node._An article used to connect words, phrases, or clauses representing alternatives; used to connect alternative terms for the same thing; used in correlation; used to correct or rephrase what was previously said; otherwise._An organ that is part of the hematopoietic and immune systems.  It is composed of the white pulp and the red pulp and is surrounded by a capsule.  It is located in the left hypochondriac region.  Its functions include lymphocyte production, blood cell storage, and blood cell destruction._To have a connection by participation or association or use; sharing in an activity or process._An instance of something happening, such as an event or incident.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Situated outside of a node.:Or; used to connect words, phrases, or clauses representing alternatives; used to connect alternative terms for the same thing; used in correlation; used to correct or rephrase what was previously said; otherwise.:An organ that is part of the lymphatic system. The spleen produces lymphocytes, filters the blood, stores blood cells, and destroys old blood cells. It is located on the left side of the abdomen near the stomach.:To have a connection by participation or association or use; sharing in an activity or process.

Concepts.definition: An article used to connect words, phrases, or clauses representing alternatives; used to connect alternative terms for the same thing; used in correlation; used to correct or rephrase what was previously said; otherwise.

An organ that is part of the hematopoietic and immune systems. It is composed of the white pulp and the red pulp and is surrounded by a capsule. It is located in the left hypochondriac region. Its functions include lymphocyte production, blood cell storage, and blood cell destruction.
To have a connection by participation or association or use; sharing in an activity or process.

Property.preferredDefinition: Occurrence; an instance of something happening.

Concepts.definition: An instance of something happening, such as an event or incident.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: indication of the presence and extent of disease.
